com.pilot.jword.view
Class SvgIcon

java.lang.Object
  com.pilot.jword.view.SvgIcon
All Implemented Interfaces:
PaintableIcon, PaintableSvgIcon, javax.swing.Icon
public class SvgIcon
extends java.lang.Object
implements PaintableSvgIcon

A paintable icon implementation for SVG images using Apache Batik. SVG images are directly created by SVG sources, or are created by converting WMF/EMF images.
